column5: Hello Everyone, I'm new member on this forum and I'm looking for recommendations for custom rod builder. In particular, I just picked up Sage X 7130 - 4 blank and  I'm looking  for reputable rod builder who can build float rod for me. Looking forward for your recommendations.
@Tom S Is quite good as well.
misfish& HTHM -thank you for your recommendations . I reach out to Spiel already. Hopfully he will get back to me soon.
He is a very busy busy boy these days. You will not be disappointed if he takes on your rod build.👍
